entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [wasm] XHarness SocketException: Transport endpoint is not connected #105370
  • VS display incorrect format comment C# code for double, float, decimal, half... when mouse hover on ==, != operator #105368
  • c# string.TrimStart() unexpected behaviour #105367
  • Failure to copy files during CI build #105364
  • WasmTestOnChrome timeouts in CI #105363
  • [wasm] StringSplitTests and ArrayTests failing with NullReferenceException #105362
  • ILCompiler in .NET9 for FreeBSD does not produce usable binaries #105358
  • NetworkStream read large data string #105359
  • ILLink doesn't track generic instantiation through GetType() #105345
    9.0.0
  • Target .NET 10 / net10.0 #105343
    10.0.0
  • Add package readmes to shared framework packages #105334
  • Unnecessary overflow check for checked BigMul on x64 #105333
    Future
  • Calling a CsWinRT NAOT dll's DllCanUnloadNow export triggers CFG failure #105330
  • Look at method alignment with OptimizationPreference=Size and ControlFlowGuard=Guard #105326
    9.0.0
  • [Android] Arm32 Android running out of memory at PfxIterationCountTests_X509Certificate2 tests #105325
  • BigInteger.MaxMagnitude #105324
  • [Apple] New Environment.CpuUsage tests failing on Apple mobile #105322
  • AspNetCore app fail to start on rocky linux 9.4 with selinux with SocketException (13): Permission denied #105320
  • [mono] LLVM 19 build failures #105319
  • Type <class name> appears to be immutable, but no constructor found to accept values. #105318
  • [browser] `NoFingerprint` wbt fails with `InvalidOperationException` #105315
    9.0.0
  • New ConfigurationBindingGeneratorTests fail on s390x (endian issue?) #105311
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add BitwiseAndNot To TensorPrimitives #105307
    10.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 26 Regressions on 7/19/2024 6:55:27 PM #105335
  • Nullref in FindImplSlotForCurrentType #105304
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: Regressions in SIMD.ConsoleMandel and System.Numerics.Tests.Perf_BigInteger #105329
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: Regressions in System.IO.Compression #105331
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: Regressions in System.Collections.Perf_LengthBucketsFrozenDictionary #105328
  • Test_Bad_WriteRelatedID_ParameterName EventSource tests causes StartStopCreatesActivity test failure #105293
    Future
  • Wasi provisioning failing #105290
    9.0.0

Closed

  • GeneratedComClass doesn't apply to inherited classes #94357
    9.0.0
  • `System.Text.Ascii.Trim`/`TrimStart`/`TrimEnd` methods include `'\0'` character/byte in trimming #104201
    9.0.0
  • EE skips static field initialization when scope references collection literals #92615
    9.0.0
  • `JIT/IL_Conformance/Convert/TestConvertFromIntegral/TestConvertFromIntegral` failing in CI with "Assert failure: `arrayBaseRef->GetArrayElementType() == ELEMENT_TYPE_OBJECT`" #105186
    9.0.0
  • Implement/Convert existing EventCounters to Metrics #79371
    9.0.0
  • improve the gc-heap-size counter #75580
    9.0.0
  • Discussion: Reducing confusion around the System.Runtime gc-heap-size EventCounter #77530
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: baseservices/exceptions/unhandled/unhandledTester/unhandledTester.cmd #105229
  • [wasm][aot] copy_szarray crash #105349
    9.0.0
  • There is some unprintable characters(&#39) in intellisense description text of System.Drawing.ColorConverter.ConvertFrom() method in the .NET Core app #28224
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Extend IMemoryCache to also provide keys/provider info #98251
  • 'System.Net.NameResolution.Functional.Tests' Failure #105092
    9.0.0
  • GetUnicode_Invalid/GetAscii_Invalid test failures on Fedora 40 #100287
    9.0.0
  • AV in Reflection FieldInfo tests #105332
  • Ascii and Latin1 APIs can return wrong results for misaligned buffers #84877
    9.0.0
  • Fatal runtime errors do not always generate crashes/Watson reports #93682
    9.0.0
  • [android] Connection issues in Sockets and Functional networking tests #104709
    9.0.0
  • IFloatingPoint missing ReadSignificandLittleEndian and other readers #92485
    Future
  • Blazor WebAssembly AOT Fails On Windows For Paths With a Space #103293
    8.0.x
  • Include WinForms trimming feature switch information #102619
    Future
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 15 Regressions on 5/4/2024 5:29:12 AM #102047
    9.0.0
  • Test cases for validation of the `SwiftIndirectResult` proposal #102082
    9.0.0
  • Test cases for validation of the `SwiftSelf<T>` proposal #102079
    9.0.0
  • Implement support for Swift frozen structs in Mono runtime #102077
    9.0.0
  • x86: Assertion failed '!"Too many unreachable block removal loops"' during 'Global local var liveness' #70786
    9.0.0
  • linux-armel checked CoreCLR_NonPortable failing to build with "Unable to find toolchain executable. Name: 'ar', Prefix: 'llvm-'" #105176
  • The type initializer for 'Microsoft.AspNetCore.SignalR.Client.HubConnection' in Unity IL2CPP build. #105292
  • ChangeDocumentationFileForPackaging causes incremental build issues inside VS #92940
    9.0.0
  • StreamReader: Read + ReadAsync = bug ??? #31347
  • CI doesn't build `net9.0` targets in source generators. #100346
    9.0.0
  • Why don't Memory/ReadOnlyMemory have indexers? #105286
  • [browser] Lazy loading should be extension agnostic #94132
    9.0.0
  • [mono][wasm] DllImport with value-type args that contain unsupported marshalled fields crashes AOT compiler #104463
    9.0.0
  • System.Data.Odbc OdbcFactory.Instance is null #82920

PullRequests

Created

  • ARM64-SVE: Add `GatherVectorWithByteOffsetFirstFaulting` #105369
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Fix DAC stack overflow in GetUsefulGlobals API #105366
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Convert `GetNumVirtuals*` from `FCall` to `QCall` #105365
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Added regression test for issue #94660 #105360
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix LINQ Aggregate/CountBy tests for Native AOT #105357
    area-System.Linq
  • [release/9.0-preview7] Don't enable validation when UseDefaultServiceProvider is called #105356
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Re-enable ConsoleKeyInfoTests.Equals_SameData test #105355
    area-System.Console
  • [release/9.0-preview7] Ensure linux uses zlib-ng and not system ZLIB #105354
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • Automatically export '__managed__Main' when needed #105353
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Ensure linux uses zlib-ng and not system ZLIB #105352
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Support field access on GetType() of T constrained to be Enum #105351
    needs-area-label
  • Arm64/Sve: Add FFR register liveness tracking #105348
    arm-sve
  • Don't overbuild source generator when root building for net48 #105347
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix probable bug in `InvariantCreateSortKeyOrdinalIgnoreCase` #105344
    area-System.Globalization, community-contribution, Future
  • Disable unhandled exception tests on macos x64 #105342
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • [EventSource] Relax assert on CounterGroup callback #105341
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • Update sln files again #105340
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix invalid IndexOutOfRangeException in Convert #105339
    area-System.Runtime, 9.0.0
  • Bump main to RC1 #105338
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add runtime config parameter to force ijwhost to load assemblies in an isolated context #105337
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • [HTTP] Unobserved exceptions report in stress #105336
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Remove unnecessary UseCompilerGeneratedDocXmlFile property #105327
    area-Meta, needs-area-label
  • [WASI] bump WASI SDK 23 #105317
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Improve iOS sample Makefile #105316
    area-Build-mono
  • Fix DeepEquals_DeepJsonDocument stack overflow that manifests in xunit.console and netfx. #105309
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [wasm] Rename module file to .mjs #105303
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-wasi, os-browser
  • Update runtime metrics tests to avoid failures on some platforms #105300
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, community-contribution
  • Update mono to support shuffle for constant inputs #105299
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [release/9.0-preview7] [browser] Extension agnostic lazy assembly loading #105298
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser
  • Avoid NullReferenceException in CharEnumerator after calling Dispose #105296
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Ensure that WaitForPendingFinalizers has seen the expected Full GC count #105289
    area-VM-coreclr, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Run native aot runtime tests on cet compatible machines #105288
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr

Merged

  • Report a diagnostic when a type inherits from a GeneratedComClass-attributed type and does not have the GeneratedComClass attribute #105277
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 9.0.0
  • Fix handling of '\0' in Ascii.Trim #105350
    area-System.Text.Encoding, 9.0.0
  • Delete dead debug-only code #105346
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Update assert to handle `object[]` element type #105287
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0-preview7] Improve the handling of SVE state as part of threadsuspend #105291
    Servicing-approved, area-PAL-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-preview7]Update downlevel to 8.0.8 #105114
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Disable verify_committed_bytes for segments #105102
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-preview7] [browser] Use StaticWebAssets fingerprinting in Wasm SDK (#103755) #105294
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Revert "[browser] Turn `BlazorCacheBootResources` off by default when targeting .NET 9" #105323
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Fix System.Globalization.Extensions.Tests for icu 74/unicode 15.1 #105282
    area-System.Globalization, test-bug, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [browser] Use StaticWebAssets fingerprinting in Wasm SDK #103755
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] [Mono] Fix the race condition issue of aot_module loading #104918
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 8.0.9
  • [WASI] SDK provisioning #105321
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 9.0.0
  • MemoryTests.AllocateLargeHeapThenRepeatedlyInterop timing out - disable #105302
    arch-wasm, disabled-test, area-Build-mono
  • Remove unnecessary ref source projects from Microsoft.Bcl packages #105312
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Delete dead code in System.Diagnostics.Tracing tests #105237
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 9.0.0
  • [test][Eventpipe] Disable eventsourceerror on OSX #105278
    needs-area-label
  • JIT: Change VN's representation for phi definitions #105198
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove unused members on runtime Thread #105158
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix source-build leg #105306
    needs-area-label
  • Make System.IO.Packaging test trim safe #105160
    area-System.IO
  • Fix intellisense package xml file failing up-to-date check in libs projects #105243
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Build .NETCoreApp source gens in allconfigurations build #105247
    needs-area-label
  • [browser] Extension agnostic lazy assembly loading #104793
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser] Turn `BlazorCacheBootResources` off by default when targeting .NET 9 #105235
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [mono][aot] Emit marhsalling exception when dealing with MONO_MARSHAL_CONV_OBJECT_IUNKNOWN #105156
    area-VM-meta-mono

Updated

  • JIT: Added SVE `GetFfr`, `SetFfr`, `LoadVectorFirstFaulting`, `GatherVectorFirstFaulting` #104502
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Migrate to zlib-ng, part 3: Remove zlib and zlib-intel source code and license mentions (second attempt) #105371
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • JIT: Introduce VNWalkPhis and use in VNNeverNegative as an example #105197
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Expose StressLog via CDAC and port StressLogAnalyzer to managed code #104999
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2501173 #105050
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Fix warning for MakeGenericType annotation mismatch #104921
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Don't dispose timers if we're in our UnhandledException handler. #104829
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Runtime.Caching, 6.0.x
  • Slightly improve MinOpts JIT TP #105250
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update docs for ByRefLike with generics for work in .NET 10 #103318
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Don't enable validation when UseDefaultServiceProvider is called #105170
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • [ILASM] Added `/DET` flag for deterministic compilations #85344
    area-ILTools-coreclr
  • Switch DirectoryControl to use AsnWriter, AsnDecoder #101512
    area-System.DirectoryServices, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • Use memfd_create when available #105178
    NO-MERGE, area-System.IO, blocked, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Proposed fix for issue XSLT extension methods format-date & format-time #97402
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Mark the new tensor APIs as experimental for .NET 9 #105268
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Remove implicit flush from BufferedStream.WriteByte #104822
    area-System.IO, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution, Future
  • Update SDK to preview 6 #104696
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [wasi] wasi:http + WasiHttpHandler #103752
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • Rename corefx -> runtime libraries #105285
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] [GC] Fix freelist crash - don't modify during check-only operation #104992
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr, 8.0.9
  • [release/8.0-staging] [browser] Fix debugger support #98494
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 8.0.9
  • Refactor memory copies in `SafeBuffer` #105206
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [release/8.0-staging] For transition profiler callbacks, always load the thread #105200
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.9
  • Do not ignore `MemoryMarshal.TryWrite` result in `Guid` #104728
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Make RandomAccess.Read*|Write* methods work with non-seekable files #96711
    area-System.IO, 9.0.0
  • Cleanup some code under FEATURE_STUBS_AS_IL #104731
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Clarify XML comments for Utf8Parser.TryParse to reflect case insensitivity #103861
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Add support for Add Sve.GatherVectorUInt*ZeroExtendFirstFaulting() #105030
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Build Mono build tasks packs only when targeting mobile #105153
    area-Infrastructure, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Advance cursors through stores in strength reduction #105267
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [PERF] Move performance testing logic into python scripts #101143
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Remove RuntimeHelpers.IsReference from NativeAOT #105118
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Base 64 decoder, reject input when unused bits are not 0 #105262
    area-System.Memory
  • [browser] Trigger relink on `EmccMaximumHeapSize` change #105027
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser
  • Fixed for assertion failure due to not checking if we are processing Ephemeral Samples in calculate_new_heap_count #105164
    area-GC-coreclr
